runner.name: Copy add data proc from tools

parameters.param: $ProcessInfo = New-Object System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo $ProcessInfo.FileName = %env.PathTo1CPlatform% $ProcessInfo.UseShellExecute = $false $ProcessInfo.Arguments = "%env.ConnectionTo1C% /Out %env.LogFile1C% /Execute ""%env.OScript%/lib/vanessa-automation/vanessa-automation.epf"" /TestManager /C""StartFeaturePlayer; VBParams=%system.teamcity.build.workingDir%\va.json""" $Process = New-Object System.Diagnostics.Process $Process.StartInfo = $ProcessInfo $Process.Start() | Out-Null $VA_PID = $Process.Id echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='env.VA_PID' value='$VA_PID']"

Start-Sleep -s 5 $cmdOutput = Get-Content "%system.teamcity.build.tempDir%\Cover.Log" -First 1 $cmdOutput $PIDArray = $cmdOutput.Split('.') $PID_ID = $PIDArray[ $PIDArray.Count - 2 ]
echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='env.PID_ID' value='$PID_ID']"
Start-Sleep -s 5

param.name: script.content
param.value: coverage-cli convert --input %system.teamcity.build.workingDir%/Cover.csv --output %system.teamcity.build.workingDir%/Cover.xml --sources IRP\src --format EDT & powershell -command "(Get-Content %system.teamcity.build.workingDir%/Cover.xml) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace '\\', '/' } | Set-Content %system.teamcity.build.workingDir%/Cover.xml"
